title: MAHA Metro Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Senior Office Assistant Posts
description: The Maharashtra Metro Rail Corporation Limited (MAHA Metro) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Senior Office Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and MBA can apply for the MAHA Metro Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
